## Summary

<br> <br>

Course covers all things nuclear. It will get increasing mathematical as the semester progresses. The emphasis will be problem solving and skills, rather than being heavy on volume of knowledge. Focus on applications as well.

## Contents

-   Nuclear Forces and Nuclear Structure

-   Radiation

-   Nuclear Power

-   Applications
